Title: Breakfast Favorites
Description: Our take on classic breakfast fare will get you buzzing!

Title: Queen City Bee
Description: Breakfast sandwich with goetta, apple, arugula, broken yolk egg and “nectar” sauce on milk bun, with your choice of side.

Title: The Worker Bee
Description: Two eggs any style; your choice of bacon, stimulus bacon, goetta, or vegan goetta; toast and a side
AdditionalNotes: Try our tofu scramble in place of eggs for a vegan alternative. (V)

Title: Ember Avo Toast
Description: A fork and knife breakfast toast with avocado, two over-easy eggs, ember oil, pickled golden raisins, arugula and walnut dukkah on toasted multigrain, with your choice of side.

Title: Broakley
Description: Breakfast sandwich with thick-cut bacon, lettuce, broken yolk egg, avocado, white cheddar, onion and tomato on milk bun, with your choice of side

Title: Blue Ash Smash
Description: A breakfast sandwich with scrambled eggs, potatoes, candied bacon, nectar sauce, chimichurri and pickled onions on multigrain bread, with your choice of side
AdditionalNotes: Only available at the Blue Ash Location

Title: CBD Bowl
Description: House seasoned chicken sausage, sautéed power greens, mushrooms and garlic herbs served over two scrambled eggs. Topped with avocado and dressed with chimichurri
AdditionalNotes: Only  available  at the Downtown location

Title: Scrambles
Description: All served with multigrain toast and your choice of side. We start with three, local, free-range eggs and then layer the flavor. No substitutions, only omissions, please.

Title: The Avi
Description: Our most popular with fresh avocado, spinach, mushrooms, tomato, onions and white cheddar

Title: Chorizo
Description: Spiced chorizo, black beans, bell peppers and white cheddar topped with smoky chipotle salsa and sour cream

Title: Greek Bee
Description:
Egg whites, sautéed chicken, spinach, 
feta, olives and garlic herbs

Title: "Bee" Spoke Scramble
Description: Choose your own favorite ingredients
AdditionalNotes:
Meat: Bacon, sausage, goetta, vegan house made goetta, chorizo, chicken +$2.00 each |
Veggies: Avocado, spinach, seasoned mushrooms, onions, tomato, garlic herbs, black beans, bell peppers +$1.00 each |
Cheese: White cheddar, feta +$1.00 each

Title: Pancakes
Description: We’ve got two types of pancakes to satisfy any craving — our classic fluffy buttermilk cakes and our gluten-free bee cakes made from bee-pollinated flowers — all served with real Ohio maple syrup.

Title: Bee Cakes
Description: Delicious gluten-free pancakes made with almond milk, quinoa and buckwheat flour

Title: Buttermilk Cakes
Description: Fluffy and sweet buttermilk pancakes, made from scratch

Title: Perfect Additions
Description: Add blueberries, chocolate chips or bananas

Title: Specialty Pancakes
Description:
With your choice of bee cake or buttermilk batter. 
Buttermilk Single $5.00  •  Stack of two $10.00   
Bee Cake Single $5.50  •  Stack of two $11.00

Title: Blue Cakes
Description: Studded with blueberries and topped with maple-macerated blueberries served with honey butter

Title: Piggy Cakes
Description:
Bacon in the batter, topped with 
whipped cream and candied pecans

Title: Nutty Cakes
Description:
Studded with chocolate chips, topped 
with natural peanut butter and bananas

Title: Seasonal Cakes
Description: Topped with seasonal fruit, whipped cream and our house-made hemp seed granola

Title: Toast
Price: Whole Wheat $1.50 | Milk Bun $2.00 | Eban's Gluten Free $2.50

Title: Free Range Egg
Description: How ever you like it

Title: Leaf Cutter
Description: 80 Acres Greens, raw beets, carrots and celery served with hot-honey vinaigrette

Title: Bee Chop
Description: 80 Acres Greens, raw beets, carrots, celery, avocado and Sleepy Bee seed mix, served with our hot-honey vinaigrette

Title: Sweet Bee Quinoa Bowl
Description: Quinoa and brown rice sauteed with mushrooms, spinach, sweet potatoes, and chimichurri topped with pickled onions

Title: Chicken Bacon Ranch Quinoa Bowl
Description: Quinoa and brown rice sautéed with marinated chicken, bacon, broccoli, celery and parsley and topped with house-made ranch dressing

Title: Lentil Rice Bowl
Description: Quinoa and brown rice sauteed with lentils, pickled lemons, and mushrooms and topped with ember vinaigrette, parsley, and pickled raisins

Title: Sandwiches
Description: Health and happiness between two slices of fresh bread or on a bed of lettuce. Comes with your choice of side.

Title: Hot Honey Lunch Sandwich
Description: Hot honey chicken with nectar sauce, vegetable slaw and ginger pickles on Allez Bakery multigrain bread

Title: Grilled Cheese
Description: White cheddar cheese melted between two slices of griddled Allez sourdough bread

Title: The Beekeeper
Description: Roasted chicken, bacon, avocado, tomato, cheddar cheese, lettuce, quick-pickled onion and “nectar” sauce on toasted multigrain

Title: Bread Alternatives:
Description: Sandwiches can be served on multigrain, housemade milk buns, or Eban's Bakehouse gluten free oat bread (GF + $1.50)

Title: Soups
Description: These change with the seasons, freshness and flavor, our reasons. Cup $3.50 • Bowl $5.00

Title: Turmeric Bone Broth
Description: Enriched broth from roasted beef and chicken bones, simmered with aromatics

Title: Ginger Coconut Sweet Potato
Description: Creamy vegan sweet potato soup, infused with coconut milk and a ginger curry kick

Title: Roasted Red Skin Potatoes
Description: With house-made honey garlic sauce

Title: Side of Toast
Price: Whole Wheat $1.50 | Milk Bread $2.00 | Eban's Gluten Free $2.50

Title: Kids Menu
Description: For friends under 12

Title: Shape Cakes
Description: Our signature healthy Bee Cakes or basic buttermilk in 3 shapes and toppings to make new friends

Title: Scrambly Bee
Description: One egg with cheese and toast, simple yet scrumptious.

Title: Bee Three
Description: Sliced chicken, sweet potatoes, side of fruit

Title: Grilled Cheezz
Description: Another classic, perfectly melty, on multigrain bread
